segments.text: Oh, look at that poor boy on the stool; my heart is in my throat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, those legs are splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, trying to get to those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is already in the cookie jar, a real accomplishment!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But he's going to tip over any second, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way it's leaning backward, it's just so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm honestly surprised he hasn't fallen already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His concentration is entirely on those cookies, not his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the little girl is right there, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just focused on getting her cookie, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This combination of heights and a wobbly base is terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could really hurt himself if he falls from up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost picture the crash of the stool and the cookies scattering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to steady that stool for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a dangerous situation, and no one is paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR
